about_the_game:
Content included:



  • Short story in English
  • Short story in Spanish
  • 5 illustrations in 4K resolution

Aeterna Chronicles: Sprout of Hate is the first entry in a series of short stories based on the Aeterna Universe. Set hundreds of cycles before the events in Summum Aeterna and Aeterna Noctis, this first chapter introduces one of the most iconic and well-known characters in the franchise, focusing on its tragic origin.

Enjoy an illustrated story featuring incredible hand-drawn images and an engaging narration that expands the lore of the Aeterna Universe, taking you to an unknown era, shortly after the eternal rivalry between the King of Darkness and the Queen of Light began.

A must-read for every follower of the Darkness (or maybe the Light).
